net.metro.systemobjects

Class RoutePath

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.metro.systemobjects.RoutePath
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<RoutePath>

    public class RoutePath
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<RoutePath>
    Object that defines one path of a particular route using a series of WayPoints and Stops.
    Author:
    Sean Harger

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(RoutePath rtePth)
        Compares two RoutePaths according to their names.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<RoutePath>
        Returns:
        negative integer if this is alphabetically before the specified RoutePath
        0 if this is alphabetically equal to the specified RoutePath
        positive integer if this is alphabetically after the specified RoutePath
